data: Diana | Major Vandyke | Eagle | Captain Eagleston March

If I didn’t tell this, nobody else ever would; certainly not Diana, nor Major Vandyke—still less Eagle himself—I mean Captain Eagleston March; and they and I are the only ones who know, except a few such people as presidents and secretaries of war and generals, who never tell anything even under torture.
Secret History Revealed By Lady Peggy O'Malley
